mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jianshenfang_name as jianshenfangName ,a.jianshenfang_photo as jianshenfangPhoto ,a.jianshenfang_address as jianshenfangAddress ,a.jianshenfang_content as jianshenfangContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jianshenfang a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.jianshenfang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangName},'%')
and a.jianshenfang_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangAddress},'%')
and a.jianshenfang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianshenfangContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
